author: Mike Robinson
method: First make the paste - add the garlic, ginger, coriander stalks, chopped lemongrass, and chopped ginger with a drop of oil, to the food processor and blitz.   Add paste to a hot pan with a drop more oil and cook for a minute.   In the same processor add the coconut milk, lime juice and zest and coriander and blitz.   Stir the vegetables into the paste and pour over the coconut milk.   Season and cook for 2-3 minutes.  Dry fry the chapattis for a minute on each side in a hot pan.   Serve in a bowl with the chapattis.
